metadata.title: CVE-2021-47394 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nf_tables: unlink table before deleting it syzbot reportsfollowing UAF: BUG: KASAN: use-after-free in memcmp+0x18f/0x1c0lib/string.c:955 nla_strcmp+0xf2/0x130 lib/nlattr.c:836nft_table_lookup.part.0+0x1a2/0x460 net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c:570nft_table_lookup net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c:4064 [inline]nf_tables_getset+0x1b3/0x860 net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c:4064nfnetlink_rcv_msg+0x659/0x13f0 net/netfilter/nfnetlink.c:285netlink_rcv_skb+0x153/0x420 net/netlink/af_netlink.c:2504 Problem is thatall get operations are lockless, so the commit_mutex held bynft_rcv_nl_event() isn't enough to stop a parallel GET request from doingread-accesses to the table object even after synchronize_rcu(). To avoidthis, unlink the table first and store the table objects in on-stackscratch space.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

No subscription required
